title: Republicans push high deductible plans and health savings accounts
description: A Republican call to give Americans cash instead of health insurance subsidies revives an old idea that has left millions with medical debt.
content: A Republican call to give Americans cash instead of health insurance subsidies revives an old idea that has left millions with medical debt.
